root.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tab_b32 (uid uuid NOT NULL, spend bool NOT NULL, spend_date timestamp without time zone NOT NULL, "docname" text, "docnomer" text, "docdate" timestamp without time zone, "col_k2" uuid, "col_k3" uuid, "col_k4" uuid, "col_k5" uuid, "col_k6" numeric, "col_k7" uuid, "col_a1" uuid, "col_a3" uuid, "col_a4" uuid, "col_a5" uuid, "col_a7" date, "col_a8" text, "col_a9" boolean, "col_b1" integer, "col_b2" time without time zone, "col_b3" time without time zone, "col_b4" text, "col_a6" integer, "col_b5" integer, "col_b6" integer, "col_b7" uuid, "col_b8" uuidtext, "col_a2" text, PRIMARY KEY(uid));
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS tab_b32_docnomer_idx ON tab_b32 (docnomer);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS tab_b32_docdate_idx ON tab_b32 (docdate);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS tab_b32_spend_idx ON tab_b32 (spend);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tab_b33 (uid uuid NOT NULL, owner uuid NOT NULL, "col_b2" integer, "col_o4" uuid, "col_a1" uuid, "col_a2" uuid, "col_a3" integer, "col_a4" numeric, "col_a5" date, "col_a6" numeric, "col_a7" numeric, "col_a8" numeric, "col_a9" uuid, "col_b1" uuid, PRIMARY KEY(uid));
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS tab_b33_owner_idx ON tab_b33 (owner);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tab_b34 (uid uuid NOT NULL, spend bool NOT NULL, spend_date timestamp without time zone NOT NULL, "docname" text, "docnomer" text, "docdate" timestamp without time zone, "col_a3" uuid, "col_a4" integer, "col_a5" uuid, "col_a6" uuid, "col_a7" uuid, "col_a8" numeric, "col_a9" uuid, "col_b2" date, "col_b3" integer, "col_b4" boolean, "col_b5" uuid, "col_b6" text, "col_b7" date, "col_b8" uuid, "col_b9" uuid, "col_c1" uuid, "col_c2" boolean, "col_c3" date, "col_c4" integer, "col_c5" uuid, "col_c6" numeric, "col_c7" integer, "col_c8" time without time zone, "col_c9" time without time zone, "col_d1" uuid, "col_d2" uuid, "col_d3" uuid, "col_a1" uuidtext, "col_b1" text, PRIMARY KEY(uid));
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS tab_b34_docnomer_idx ON tab_b34 (docnomer);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS tab_b34_docdate_idx ON tab_b34 (docdate);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS tab_b34_spend_idx ON tab_b34 (spend);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tab_b35 (uid uuid NOT NULL, owner uuid NOT NULL, "col_b3" integer, "col_a9" uuid, "col_b1" uuid, "col_b4" uuid, "col_a1" uuid, "col_a2" integer, "col_a3" numeric, "col_a4" numeric, "col_a5" numeric, "col_a6" uuid, "col_a7" uuid, "col_a8" numeric, "col_b2" uuid, PRIMARY KEY(uid));
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS tab_b35_owner_idx ON tab_b35 (owner);
